title: Old hud must be brought back.
body: Do not be like Google and force your gay little homo upgrades to us we dont play your game and buy skins to get crappy things added to the game listen to the people playing the game you cunts and dont add these crap things you fuckers atleast give us an option because i aint playing this game if you keep this piece of shit hud i swear fucken hell wake up pricks

replies.body:
riot run by a bunch of retards, I muted a player for verbal abuse, GUESS WHAT! GOT HIM 4 TIMES IN A ROW (RANKED QUE)!!!!!!!

LOOLOLOLOLOLO
"old hud MUST be brought back because i fucking say so"
